mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.people_id AS "peopleId", a.rect_num AS "rectNum", a.rect_place AS "rectPlace", a.atte_type AS "atteType", a.rect_type AS "rectType", a.case_type AS "caseType", a.charge AS "charge", a.orig_charge AS "origCharge", a.orig_begin AS "origBegin", a.orig_end AS "origEnd", a.rect_begin AS "rectBegin", a.rect_end AS "rectEnd", a.receive_mode AS "receiveMode", a.four_his AS "fourHis", a.recidivist AS "recidivist", a.thr_hold AS "thrHold", a.correcthas AS "correcthas", a.corrected AS "corrected", a.correctlift AS "correctlift", a.detached AS "detached", a.deta_reason AS "detaReason", a.deta_supe AS "detaSupe", a.deta_corr AS "detaCorr", a.lack_contr AS "lackContr", a.lack_contr_re AS "lackContrRe", a.lack_contr_case AS "lackContrCase", a.lack_contr_case_corr AS "lackContrCaseCorr", a.rewandpun AS "rewandpun", a.pena_chan AS "penaChan", a.reoffend AS "reoffend", a.reof_charge AS "reofCharge", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"

a.id AS "id", a.people_id AS "peopleId", a.rect_num AS "rectNum", a.rect_place AS "rectPlace", a.atte_type AS "atteType", a.rect_type AS "rectType", a.case_type AS "caseType", a.charge AS "charge", a.orig_charge AS "origCharge", a.orig_begin AS "origBegin", a.orig_end AS "origEnd", a.rect_begin AS "rectBegin", a.rect_end AS "rectEnd", a.receive_mode AS "receiveMode", a.four_his AS "fourHis", a.recidivist AS "recidivist", a.thr_hold AS "thrHold", a.correcthas AS "correcthas", a.corrected AS "corrected", a.correctlift AS "correctlift", a.detached AS "detached", a.deta_reason AS "detaReason", a.deta_supe AS "detaSupe", a.deta_corr AS "detaCorr", a.lack_contr AS "lackContr", a.lack_contr_re AS "lackContrRe", a.lack_contr_case AS "lackContrCase", a.lack_contr_case_corr AS "lackContrCaseCorr", a.rewandpun AS "rewandpun", a.pena_chan AS "penaChan", a.reoffend AS "reoffend", a.reof_charge AS "reofCharge", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", b.ident AS "ident", b. NAME AS "name", b.sex AS "sex", b.telephone AS "telephone", b.type AS "type", b.censu AS "censu", b.domiciledetail AS "domiciledetail", b.residencedetail AS "residencedetail", b.images AS "images", b.birthday AS "birthday", a20.name AS "comName", (case a.atte_type when 01 then '高' when 02 then '中' when 03 then '低' else '' end) "atteTypeLable"
LEFT JOIN sys_area a20 ON a20.id = b.area_com_id
LEFT JOIN sys_area a21 ON a21.id = b.area_grid_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ccm_house_rectification a LEFT JOIN ccm_people b ON a.people_id = b.id
a.people_id = #{id} and a.del_flag = '0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ccm_house_rectification( id, people_id, rect_num, rect_place, atte_type, rect_type, case_type, charge, orig_charge, orig_begin, orig_end, rect_begin, rect_end, receive_mode, four_his, recidivist, thr_hold, correcthas, corrected, correctlift, detached, deta_reason, deta_supe, deta_corr, lack_contr, lack_contr_re, lack_contr_case, lack_contr_case_corr, rewandpun, pena_chan, reoffend, reof_charge, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{peopleId}, #{rectNum}, #{rectPlace}, #{atteType}, #{rectType}, #{caseType}, #{charge}, #{origCharge}, #{origBegin}, #{origEnd}, #{rectBegin}, #{rectEnd}, #{receiveMode}, #{fourHis}, #{recidivist}, #{thrHold}, #{correcthas}, #{corrected}, #{correctlift}, #{detached}, #{detaReason}, #{detaSupe}, #{detaCorr}, #{lackContr}, #{lackContrRe}, #{lackContrCase}, #{lackContrCaseCorr}, #{rewandpun}, #{penaChan}, #{reoffend}, #{reofCharge}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ccm_house_rectification SET people_id = #{peopleId}, rect_num = #{rectNum}, atte_type = #{atteType}, rect_place = #{rectPlace}, rect_type = #{rectType}, case_type = #{caseType}, charge = #{charge}, orig_charge = #{origCharge}, orig_begin = #{origBegin}, orig_end = #{origEnd}, rect_begin = #{rectBegin}, rect_end = #{rectEnd}, receive_mode = #{receiveMode}, four_his = #{fourHis}, recidivist = #{recidivist}, thr_hold = #{thrHold}, correcthas = #{correcthas}, corrected = #{corrected}, correctlift = #{correctlift}, detached = #{detached}, deta_reason = #{detaReason}, deta_supe = #{detaSupe}, deta_corr = #{detaCorr}, lack_contr = #{lackContr}, lack_contr_re = #{lackContrRe}, lack_contr_case = #{lackContrCase}, lack_contr_case_corr = #{lackContrCaseCorr}, rewandpun = #{rewandpun}, pena_chan = #{penaChan}, reoffend = #{reoffend}, reof_charge = #{reofCharge}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
